TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DamageEventHandler(object o, DamageEventArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed DamageEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the DamageEventHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the DamageEventHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the DamageEventHandler is removed from the event.
